text: Minecraft Legends is a 2023 real-time video game developed by Mojang Studios and Blackbird Interactive and published by Xbox Game Studios. It was released on April 18, 2023. In this game, the player must save villages that are invaded by piglins and fight The Great Hog, which is the final boss. == Bosses == The game has 4 bosses. * The Beast * The Devourer * The Unbreakable * The Great Hog, the main antagonist and final boss == Related pages == * Minecraft * Minecraft Earth == References == # Boddy, Zachary; Brown, Matt (October 15, 2022). "Minecraft Legends coming spring 2023, gameplay debuts at Minecraft Live". Windows Central. Archived from the original on October 20, 2022. Retrieved October 19, 2022.
